name: Descent into the Chasm
description:
In Descent into the Chasm, you are a child whose curiosity has been piqued by the Legend of the Chasm. What, or who, lies at the bottom? As a masocore platformer, even the most resilient of challengers will find their journey to be perilous.

--

Controls: 

A     D   = Movement

SPACE = Jump

M = Mute BGM

N  = Mute Sound FX

R = Reset back to the Main Menu

Tab = Show Keybinds In-Game

--

Difficulty Selection:

EASY: Reset back to the same level

NORMAL: Reset back to the previous level

HARD: Reset back to the beginning
